general_provisions: This bill addresses provisions related to heavy duty vehicles.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>establishes a fee for a registration or renewal of a heavy duty vehicle with a 2009 or older model year;<hr><ltbullet>provides for the deposit of revenue from the registration or renewal fee into the Environmental Mitigation and Response Fund; and<hr><ltbullet>makes technical and conforming changes.
